recipies.name: Plain Paratha
recipies.author: Naseer
recipies.description: Parathas are simple flatbreads that are made with whole wheat (or atta) flour and just a few other simple ingredients. A soft dough is prepared by hand, formed and flattened, and then folded several times to creats lots of flaky layers. They are then roasted to perfection and served warm with a variety of indian dishes

ingredients.ingredient: whole wheat flour(all purpose flour can also be used)

recipies.inst: In a medium bowl, whisk together milk and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture; whisk until all is neat.
